ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: I destroyed the entire Fairy camp in Lesser Fay multiple times, even killed the Princess (and a friend of mine killed the king) but the only dust we got was
ygData.messageBody:
I destroyed the entire Fairy camp in Lesser Fay
multiple times, even killed the Princess (and a friend
of mine killed the king) but the only dust we got was
fairy dust. =( So either it's REALLY rare, or it's
not there

Gazamel Prime
Master Tinker
Solusek Ro
